plot: Villagers are living in fear as strange things are happening everyday. Later they discover there are some unknown people behind this, who operate only in the dark. Who are these people and what is their motive?
title: Savarkhed: Ek Gaav
plot_es: Villagers are living in fear as strange things are happening everyday. Later they discover there are some unknown people behind this, who operate only in the dark. Who are these people and what is their motive?
plot_en: Villagers are living in fear as strange things are happening everyday. Later they discover there are some unknown people behind this, who operate only in the dark. Who are these people and what is their motive?
